snippet.title: Retro Game Trailers: ALIEN Versus PREDATOR (1999) PC Trailer
snippet.description: A cool old trailer for a great FPS I used to play a lot, and still do now. This was recorded directly from my ALIENS Special Edition VHS (hence the quality). Its a slightly different version of the trailer usually seen for the game so I thought I'd be a nice little thing to share with all of you. Also fairly sure the narrator might be none other than Don LaFontaine. All rights belong to FOX Interactive and 20th Century FOX.
